HiddenText.Name: What if I discover plagiarism or other student honor issues?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What if I discover plagiarism or other student honor issues?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Please notify the Student Honor Office through e-mail
sho@byui.edu or phone: (208) 496-9300 to report and counsel regarding possible student violations of the honor code.
They are available for counsel regarding any issues that may arise, and they encourage all students and faculty to be aware of the SHO policies and procedures.
